entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
